battle_traits.name: BLESSED BY THE PLAGUEFATHER:
battle_traits.description: Each of the Maggotkin is a walking vector of disease, a willing incubator for maladies that ravage the body and spirit with horrific virulence.
battle_traits.effect: Pick 1 of the following effects: Infect: Pick an enemy unit that is in combat with a friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle unit to be the target. The target has the Diseased keyword. Spread: Pick a Diseased enemy unit to be the target. Each other enemy unit within the target's combat range has the Diseased keyword. Mutate: If all enemy units on the battlefield have the Diseased keyword, inflict 1 mortal damage on each of them.

battle_traits.name: Desperate Remedies
battle_traits.description: When fighters are afflicted with the plagues of Nurgle, all efforts to recuperate must be focused entirely on stemming the spread of the disease.
battle_traits.effect: If a Diseased enemy unit uses an ability that would heal or return slain models to it, instead of healing or returning slain models to it, that unit no longer has the Diseased keyword.

battle_traits.name: WRACKED WITH DISEASE:
battle_traits.description: The Maggotkin wage war with weeping wounds and pustulant boils as well as with rusted weapons.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a D3 for each Diseased enemy unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

Tallyband Of Nurgle.name: Personified
Tallyband Of Nurgle.description: The Tallyband is a trudging, lumbering, squirming mass of rancid daemonflesh that rolls across the battlefield like the inexorable approach of death itself.
Tallyband Of Nurgle.effect: From the second battle round onwards, add 1 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted, if any, by the 'Wracked with Disease' ability.

Plague Cyst.name: Vectors Of Contagion
Plague Cyst.description: The bloated forms of these Nurglites are ever at bursting point, ready to shower attackers with contagious fluid.
Plague Cyst.effect: Each time a model in a friendly Rotbringers unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a number of dice equal to the slain model's Health characteristic, to a maximum of 4. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

Nurgle'S Menagerie.name: Grotesque
Nurgle'S Menagerie.description: The children of Grandfather Nurgle seek any opportunity to rot the veil and let the festering delights of his Garden spill into the realms.
Nurgle'S Menagerie.effect: During army composition, you can include 2 Feculent Gnarlmaws in your army instead of 1.

Affliction Cyst.name: From Noxious Skies
Affliction Cyst.description: The air fills with the thunderous drone of membranous wings as the warriors of the Affliction Cyst ride their bloated Rot Flies into battle.
Affliction Cyst.declare: Pick up to 2 friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle units that have Fly.
Affliction Cyst.effect: Remove the targets from the battlefield and set them up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

heroic_traits.name: Gift Of Febrile Frenzy
heroic_traits.description: This general can invigorate their usually sluggish minions by releasing a fever upon them that drives them into a wild delirium.
heroic_traits.effect: Add 1" to the Move characteristic of friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle units that do not have Fly if they are wholly within 12" of this unit at the start of the move.

heroic_traits.name: Grandfather'S Blessing
heroic_traits.description: This mighty Nurglite is so diseased that they are rejuvenated by decay and plague.
heroic_traits.effect: If this unit is in combat with a Diseased enemy unit, Heal (D6) this unit.

heroic_traits.reaction_condition: Opponent declared a command   for a unit in combat with this unit
heroic_traits.name: Overpowering Stench
heroic_traits.description: This general exudes an odour so wretched that even Nurgle's daemons cannot adequately describe it. Enemies recoil, choking on their own vomit at the slightest whiff and rendered speechless as their senses are overwhelmed.
heroic_traits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 5+, that command has no effect. The command still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use the command are still lost.

artefacts_of_power.name: The Witherstave
artefacts_of_power.description: Carved from the heartwood of a tormented Treelord, the Witherstave thrums with a soured mockery of the Sylvaneth spirit song. Those that hear it feel a terrible weakness shiver their limbs as a jarring dirge of despair clouds their minds.
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

artefacts_of_power.name: Rustfang
artefacts_of_power.description: Rustfang is a cursed battle- axe whose blade crawls with a thick layer of sentient corrosion. The slightest touch of this blade spreads its ferric blight, chewing away the foe's armour in moments.
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Subtract 1 from save rolls for the target for the rest of the battle.

artefacts_of_power.name: The Carrion Dirge
artefacts_of_power.description: When blown, this filth-encrusted horn shrieks with the tongue of a thousand carrion crows. Those outside Nurgle's favour who hear it are struck with a deep despondency. Why stand defiant? Why seek victory? Why do anything at all?
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Subtract 3 from each target's control score for the rest of the turn.

Lore Of Malignance.name: Fleshy Abundance
Lore Of Malignance.description: The sorcerer generously bestows a growth spurt of the most repulsive kind upon their allies, causing their bodies to bloat with great wobbling mounds of grey-green fat.
Lore Of Malignance.declare: Pick a friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Malignance.effect: If the target unit is damaged, Heal (D3) the target. If the target is not damaged, subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target that unit until the start of your next turn.

Lore Of Malignance.name: Cloying Quagmire
Lore Of Malignance.description: The sorcerer thrusts their hands into the soil, causing the ground beneath their enemies to putrefy into a sucking, grasping quagmire.
Lore Of Malignance.declare: Pick a friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Malignance.effect: Halve the target's Move characteristic until the start of your next turn. If the target's Save characteristic is 3+ or better, subtract 1 from run rolls and charge rolls for that unit until the start of your next turn.

Lore Of Malignance.name: Magnificent Buboes
Lore Of Malignance.description: With a gracious sweep of their hand, the sorcerer bestows upon their victim one of Nurgle's prettiest afflictions - a clutch of debilitating pustules and boils.
Lore Of Malignance.declare: Pick a friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy Hero within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Malignance.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target's attacks and subtract 1 from casting rolls, chanting rolls, banishment rolls and unbinding rolls for the target.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Gnarlrod is 3. 8

abilities.name: Deluge Of Nurgle
abilities.description: Rotigus has an affinity with the plagued downpours that spill from Nurgle's cauldron, and he is able to influence where the blighted rains fall.
abilities.declare: Pick each Diseased enemy unit on the battlefield and each friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle unit in combat with any Diseased enemy units to be the targets. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+: 
* Inflict an amount of mortal damage on  each enemy target equal to the roll. 
* Heal (X) each friendly target, where X is  an amount equal to the roll.

abilities.name: MOUNTAIN OF LOATHSOME FLESH:
abilities.description: Rotigus is a massively corpulent abomination; when he goes on a rampage, enemies caught in his path are often swallowed up and crushed between great rolls of rancid blubber.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, roll a dice. On a 3+, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Bringer Of Plenty
abilities.description: Rotigus is a masterful sorcerer, able to bind the energies of decay with a wave of his gnarled wand. His spells inspire grotesque fecundity and flesh-growth, stimulated through the arcane deluge.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Colossal Blight Weapons is 3.

abilities.name: Locus Of Nurgle
abilities.description: The Great Unclean calls upon Grandfather Nurgle to tear a rift in reality through which loathsome, foetid daemons can spill.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle Daemon unit that started the battle with 3 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: BLOATED WITH CORRUPTION:
abilities.description: Should a Great Unclean One be wounded, the noxious effluvia within its swollen body bursts forth in a flesh-melting spray.
abilities.declare: If this unit is damaged, pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Plague Wind
abilities.description: With a satisfied belch, the greater daemon unleashes a gust of putrid air that smothers the battlefield.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target has the Diseased keyword.

abilities.reaction_condition: You declared a Fight ability   for this unit
abilities.name: CAPTAIN OF THE PLAGUE LEGIONS:
abilities.description: Poxbringers lead their fellow Plaguebearers into battle and ensure that the orders of the Great Unclean Ones are followed to the letter.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly Plaguebearers unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit's combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target's attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Of Nurgle
abilities.description: Wherever Horticulous slimes around in the Mortal Realms, daemonic foliage pokes through the cracks in reality and swiftly takes root.
abilities.effect: If there are fewer than 3 friendly Feculent Gnarlmaws on the battlefield, you can set up a Feculent Gnarlmaw wholly within 12" of this unit, more than 3" from all enemy units, objectives and other terrain features.

abilities.name: Beast Handler
abilities.description: Horticulous is accompanied by romping packs of Beasts of Nurgle, whose foolishness he always forgives and who look to him like hounds do their master.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Beasts of Nurgle unit that has been destroyed.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, set up a replacement unit wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: I'M Watching You
abilities.description: Spoilpox Scriveners are responsible for making sure that the Plaguebearers of the tallybands do not shirk their duties.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Plaguebearers unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D6. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn: Tally of Blows: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target's melee weapons. Recorded Stamina: Add 1 to save rolls for the target.

abilities.name: Jolly Gutpipes
abilities.description: Sloppity Bilepipers have a suitably revolting repertoire of repulsive refrains to draw upon in battle.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle Daemon unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply for the rest of the turn: A-Stabbing We Will Go!: Add 1 to wound rolls for the target's attacks. Early One Evening My Pustule Was Seeping: Ward rolls cannot be made for damage points inflicted by the target's combat attacks. My Love Is Like a Ripe, Ripe Fart: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units that target the target unit.

abilities.name: Endless Swar M
abilities.description: The presence of Nurglings in the realms continuously draws more of their number from the Grandfather's Garden, making their swarms extremely hard to eradicate.
abilities.effect: Heal (3) this unit.

abilities.name: Attention Seekers
abilities.description: Beasts of Nurgle seek out playmates with an enthusiasm that is rarely reciprocated by the horrified source of their fascination.
abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, pick the closest enemy unit to it to be the target. If 2 or more enemy units are tied to be the closest, you can pick which is the target. Then, make a charge roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: This unit can move a distance up to the value of the charge roll. During that move, this unit can move into combat and can pass through models in the target unit, but it must end that move within 1" of the target. Then, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: BEAST
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Ripe Pastures
abilities.description: Rot Flies buzz across the battlefield, consuming their enemies before moving on to fresh targets, their retreat covered by a repulsive cloud of decaying flesh.
abilities.effect: This unit can use Charge abilities even if it used a Retreat ability in the same turn. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on this unit by Retreat abilities.

abilities.name: Cloud Of Flies
abilities.description: Plaguebearers are surrounded by a cloud of swarming flies that feast on their rotting bodies.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points,the Attacks characteristic of Ghurk's Tentacle is 2.

abilities.reaction_condition: You  declared the ‘Counter-charge’ command for  this unit
abilities.name: Blighted Stampede
abilities.description: At a signal from his brothers, the usually ponderous Ghurk launches into an earthshaking counter-charge. Nearby Maggotkin are quick to take advantage of the enemy's shock at the abomination's sudden turn of speed.
abilities.effect: Pick up to 2 friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets. After the 'Counter-charge' command for this unit has been resolved, if this unit charged, each of the targets can immediately use the 'Counter-charge' command in an order of your choosing without any command points being spent.

abilities.name: Horrific Opponent
abilities.description: So terrifying are the Brothers Glott that enemy lines are sent into disarray at the very sight of them.
abilities.effect: Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with this unit. 6

abilities.name: Overgrowth Of Flesh
abilities.description: For all his endless grumbling, Ethrac Glott is not miserly in doling out Nurgle's bountiful gifts.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the target's Health characteristic. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target, to a maximum of 7 mortal damage.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Tripletongue's Claws and Maw is 3.

abilities.name: Lord Of Nurglings
abilities.description: Morbidex Twiceborn is the chosen mortal champion of the Nurglings, who follow him into battle with boundless enthusiasm.
abilities.effect:
While any friendly Nurglings units are wholly within 12" of this unit: 
* Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to each of those units each phase. 
* Add 3 to those units' control scores.

abilities.name: Gigantic Nurgling-Kin
abilities.description: Twisted by the cruel attentions of manifold Nurglings, Morbidex has come to resemble them physically and has gained much of their unnatural resilience.
abilities.effect: Heal (X) this unit, where X is half the number of damage points this unit has (rounding up).

abilities.name: Tide Of Nurglings
abilities.description: Morbidex's Pox Maggoth bellows out a gurgling roar that drives nearby swarms of Nurglings into a frenzy, drowning enemies in a filthy, living tide.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Nurglings unit within this unit's combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, the target's melee weapons have Crit (Mortal) for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Bilespurter's Claws and Maw is 3. 6

abilities.name: Miasma Of Pestilence
abilities.description: Bloab Rotspawned completes a complicated gesture in the air and a vile mist rises from the ground around his target. While it lasts, even the lightest graze seems to turn gangrenous.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time you allocate any damage points that were inflicted by another friendly ability to the target, roll a dice. On a 4+, allocate 1 additional damage point to the target.

abilities.name: Daemon Flies
abilities.description: The whirling fly-storm that surrounds Bloab blinds and chokes his victims.
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit within 7" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice for each target. On a 4+: 
* Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. 
* Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target's combat attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: MASTER OF THE SLIME FLEET:
abilities.description: Gutrot's Slime Fleet haunts the oceans of the Mortal Realms, fighting alongside and transporting warriors that the Lord of Tentacles judges to share his aims.
abilities.declare: Pick a regiment led by this unit to be the target if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Each unit in the target regiment is set up in reserve aboard the Slime Fleet. Those units have now been deployed.

abilities.name: Flailing Tentacles
abilities.description: Gutrot grabs his opponents with his melange of slimy tentacles, rendering them helpless as he swings his rusted axe.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Pestilential Beachhead
abilities.description: To the creak of rotting timbers and the waft of rancid brine, the Slime Fleet makes land.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is aboard the Slime Fleet.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit on the battlefield, wholly within 7" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units. Then set up every other friendly unit that is aboard the Slime Fleet on the battlefield wholly within 7" of a battlefield edge, wholly within 7" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: VECTORS OF FOULEST CONTAGION:
abilities.description: Through the use of rancid corpse-totems and other such gifts from the Grandfather, a Lord of Afflictions spreads death wherever they travel.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Master Of Rot Flies
abilities.description: A Lord of Afflictions leads a swarm of Rot Flies that act as brutal linebreakers, using their sheer bulk to smash enemy formations asunder.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick this unit and up to 2 friendly Pusgoyle Blightlords units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the targets' Companion melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Whippermaw's Claws and Maws is 3.

abilities.name: Grasping Tongue
abilities.description: The massive Pox Maggoth Whippermaw lashes its tongue around a hapless victim, preparing to devour it.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle units that target that enemy unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Acid Ichor
abilities.description: Whenever Orghotts's flesh is cut open, a gout of daemonic ichor spews out with shocking force. Its vitriolic potency is enough to burn through steel and dissolve the flesh beneath.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: THRICE-RIPENED DEATH'S HEADS:
abilities.description: These blessed death's heads are projectiles ripe with disease and hurled at incoming foes to spread the plagues festering within.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll D3. On 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Festering Bulwark
abilities.description: Heavy shield planted in the mud, a Lord of Blights orders their warriors brace for the enemy charge.
abilities.effect: The Blighted Weapons used by friendly Putrid Blightkings units have Anti-charge (+1 Rend) while those units are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Knell Of Doom
abilities.description: The ominous toll of the Doom Bell is enough to give pause to even the bravest warriors.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 24" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1" from the Move characteristic of each target and subtract 1 from run rolls and charge rolls for each target. 4

abilities.name: Omens Of Decay
abilities.description: Harbingers of Decay are diseased prophets, able to divine omens through grisly rites and observing the spread of sickness.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract twice the current battle round number from the target's control score for the rest of the turn. If the chanting roll was 10+, this ability affects all enemy units within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Tainted Sorceries
abilities.description: Rotbringer Sorcerers hold that there is nothing they cannot corrupt.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that was picked to be the target of a spell that was successfully cast by this unit this phase to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, subtract 1 from ward rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Lord Of The Blightkings
abilities.description: A Lord of Plagues leads their chosen warriors to battle with a febrile energy.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly Putrid Blightkings units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Sevenfold Slaughter
abilities.description: A Lord of Plagues drives their warriors to keep hacking at the foe until they are reduced to nothing more than twitching, filth- streaked offal.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Putrid Blightkings unit that charged this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target's Blighted Weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Relentless Attackers
abilities.description: Blightlords descend from fume-choked skies to smash Nurgle's most stubborn enemies to ruin.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit's Flyrider's Arsenal for attacks that target units contesting an objective you do not control.

abilities.name: Bloated Bulk
abilities.description: The plague-swollen heft of the Blightkings grants them a presence far beyond their limited numbers.
abilities.effect: Add 3 to this unit's control score while each model in this unit is contesting an objective you control.

abilities.name: Virulent Concoctions
abilities.description: The hideous diseases formulated by the Rotmire Creed rapidly transmit from one uninfected body to another.
abilities.effect: When using the 'Blessed by the Plaguefather' ability, if you choose to infect an enemy unit, you can pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it by this unit's shooting attacks this turn to be the target even if that unit is not in combat with a friendly Maggotkin of Nurgle unit.

abilities.name: Riddled With Disease
abilities.description: The vapours emanating from a Feculent Gnarlmaw are laden with plagues and disease.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this terrain feature to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target has the Diseased keyword.
